sections.title: Ritualist (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Ritualist class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Spells per Day (Ritualist)
sections.description: Ritualist levels advance spellcasting progression from a previous class, gaining spells per day, spells known, and increased caster level without other class benefits.

sections.title: Esoteric Discovery (Ex) (Ritualist)
sections.description: Allows the ritualist to take 10 on skill checks for selected skills when casting occult rituals, usable once per skill per ritual.

sections.title: Student of Mysteries (Ex) (Ritualist)
sections.description: Adds half ritualist level as a bonus to Intelligence checks made to learn new occult rituals.

sections.title: Stabilize Ritual (Su) (Ritualist)
sections.description: Once per day as a full-round action, removes DC increases that have accumulated from pausing a ritual.

sections.title: Occult Expertise (Ex) (Ritualist)
sections.description: Adds half class level as bonus to occult skill unlock checks and allows taking 10 on occult skill unlocks with esoteric discovery skills.

sections.title: Cautious Rituals (Su) (Ritualist)
sections.description: Allows casting rituals with increased DCs but reduced chance of failure effects, with improvements at higher levels removing backlash and DC penalties.

sections.title: Expedited Rituals (Su) (Ritualist)
sections.description: Allows casting rituals that complete upon successful skill checks rather than waiting for full casting time, with DC penalties that are eventually removed.

sections.title: Independent Rituals (Su) (Ritualist)
sections.description: Allows casting rituals without secondary casters, gaining skill check bonuses and guaranteed take 10 on esoteric discovery skills.

sections.title: Focused Rituals (Su) (Ritualist)
sections.description: Allows continuing ritual casting even if secondary casters are incapacitated, killed, or moved out of range.

sections.title: Master of Mysteries (Su) (Ritualist)
sections.description: Once per day, dramatically reduces ritual casting time from 10 minutes per level to 1 round per level, or 1 hour per level to 1 minute per level.
